description: Like http://anidb.net/ch1658 [Yamazaki], Shinohara Shinnoshin is a http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] Intelligence Agent aka Spy, but he is allied with http://anidb.net/ch1661 [Itou Kamotarou]`s camp, vs. http://anidb.net/ch1658 [Yamazaki] for http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou]`s camp.
name: Shinohara Shinnoshin
